content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s exigence in the passage?

choices.label: A cultural pressure for people with disabilities to strive for perfection
A growing public interest in questions of diversity and representation
A decline in the opportunities for disabled athletes that she finds troubling
A spate of high-profile athletic achievements that she finds inspiring

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
